Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • calhrs - Pipeline calibration for HRS.
  • dopoff - Calculate on-board Doppler compensation for specalign.
  • obsum - Produce brief, time-ordered summary of groups in data.
  • reflux - Apply new absolute sensitivity corrections to HRS spectra.
  • showspiral - Build and display spiral-search map.
  • spiralmap - Build spiral-search map.
  • tacount - Calculate observed count rate for target acquisition.
  • wavecal - Compute HRS wavelength offset and dispersion coefficients.
  • z_calib - Subpackage of tasks supporting the HRS calibration process.

  • (Type "help hrs opt=sys" for more information about the 'hrs' package).
